name: node-hangman
description: A simple game of hangman you can play directly in the CLI

scripts.build-win: pkg -t node12-win -o build/Node-Hangman_win.exe Hangman.js && node tools/postbuild.js
scripts.build-linux: pkg -t node12-linux -o build/Node-Hangman_linux Hangman.js && node tools/postbuild.js
scripts.build: npm run build-win && npm run build-linux && node tools/postbuild.js
